item.title: British Court Rules Legal Definition of Women is Based on Biological Sex
item.description: Britain’s Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday that trans women do not meet the legal definition of female under the country’s Equality Act. However, the ...

item.title: Canada Reschedules Political Debate That Conflicted With a Hockey Game
Bukele Has Power to Return Deportee to U.S., Experts Say
item.description: Experts say President Nayib Bukele has the power but not the interest to return a man deported from Maryland to El Salvador in error.
